Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Pro.EXPLANATION: The financial savings achieved through various cost-saving initiatives.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Pro.FORMULA: Total Cost Savings from Maintenance Activities

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Pro.EXPLANATION: The average time from when a purchase order is placed to when the goods are received.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Pro.FORMULA: Total Time to Process Purchase Orders / Number of Purchase Orders

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Pro.EXPLANATION: The average time taken by suppliers to deliver goods after receiving a purchase order.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Pro.FORMULA: Total Supplier Lead Time / Number of Orders

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Pro.EXPLANATION: The return on investment from procurement activities.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Pro.FORMULA: (Cost Savings from Procurement Activities / Total Procurement Costs) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Pro.EXPLANATION: The percentage of contracts that adhere to agreed terms and conditions.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Pro.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Contracts / Total Number of Contracts) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Pro.EXPLANATION: The percentage of defects found in products received from suppliers.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Pro.FORMULA: (Number of Defective Items / Total Items Received) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Pro.EXPLANATION: The difference between the actual purchase price and the budgeted price.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Pro.FORMULA: (Actual Purchase Price - Standard Purchase Price) / Standard Purchase Price * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Pro.EXPLANATION: The percentage of orders delivered on or before the promised delivery date.
